channel.title: Delay Stomp decrease volume when increasing feedback
channel.description:
Hi, I’ve implemented the factory patch stomp/delay in my patch, when I increase the amount of feedback the level of incoming signal decreases dramatically, someone haves any suggestion for solve this issue?
In my mind I’ve planned to link the feedback knob to a gain knob but with a different scale, for example at 100% of feedback gain is at 20% to avoid saturation, could it work? How to do it?
Thanks a lot

item.title: Delay Stomp decrease volume when increasing feedback
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

You can change the scaling of knobs with math objects.

In this example the gain will be slightly reduced by raising feedback and more strong with stronger feedback because of the math/exp object.

Bildschirmfoto 2017-11-23 um 23.52.48.png1150x722 38 KB

Another option would be to write custom curves into a table and hook up the dial to a delay/read the will spit out the values.

Read full topic
item.source: Delay Stomp decrease volume when increasing feedback
